result.description: The genomes of the two bacterial species adopted in this Project (E. colo and Pseudomonas putida) will be [i] erased of instability determinants and other genes encoding functions considered to be irrelevant for the sake of MADONNA and [ii] endowed with new traits to make them withstand the working conditions of the reactions of interest.
